関連科目: This is a high-level "content-based" course. Therefore, it is preferable for students to have already taken similar high-level courses like: Listening and Speaking 3, Critical Writing, language and Communication
授業方法: Lessons will be designed to foster student autonomy and enhance students' ability to critically assess written materials and oral presentations/lectures in and English-only environment. Students are expected to actively engage in class discussions based on teacher lectures or previously assigned readings or homework.Additionally, students can expect to regularly discuss and review course content in pairs or small groups as well as providing individual oral presentations utilized in class
